title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK that wraps the Ollama REST API for easy integration into Python apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node.js and browsers to talk to the local Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama models as first-class LLM and chat components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now renamed Open WebUI) that adds chat history, RAG, admin panel and more.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library providing idiomatic wrappers around the Ollama REST endpoints.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API, covering chat, generate and model ops.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Unofficial Node CLI wrapper that exposes generate/chat commands and model helpers for Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models onto Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) published to Docker Hub with docker-compose examples.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector that lets BPMN workflows call local Ollama models for generative tasks.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Python template showing how to build a RAG system with Ollama, ChromaDB and LangChain.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that exposes Ollama models as slash commands in any server.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Go service that bridges Ollama to Slack via socket-mode for DM and channel queries.

title: ollama-n8n
summary: n8n community node that adds Ollama chat & generate operations to no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-grafana
summary: Experimental Grafana datasource that queries Ollama metrics endpoint for observability dashboards.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET SDK and CLI tool for Windows/Linux/macOS to integrate Ollama models into C#/F# apps.
